meanings.definition: A condition in which the force of the blood against the artery walls is too high.
meanings.sent1: Untreated hypertension can lead to serious health problems like heart disease and stroke.
meanings.sent2: Regular check-ups are important to monitor the levels of hypertension in patients with this condition.
meanings.sent3: Why did the bicycle refuse to race? It was afraid of developing hypertension in its tires!

meanings.sent5: The image of a balloon about to burst perfectly illustrates the concept of hypertension in the arteries.
